name: #Week02 - Battle Arena
description:
WASD - Move character

LEFT HOLD (mouse) - Charge shoot

RIGHT CLICK (mouse) - Shoot

SHIFT - Shield

  • You can't shoot while moving!
  • You have one shield use per wave!
  • Defeat as many waves as possible!

This is a prototype game made for the second week of the GAMEDEVTRIAL, using construct 2. Learn more about its development in our page.
